default.title: Necktie
default.description: For the person who has everything - or so he thought! This personalized photo tie will be a hit around the water cooler or holiday party. Made of silky 100% polyester fabric and comes in six colors. Photos appear on both sides and measure 1x1½" each.

en_US.title: Necktie
en_US.description: For the person who has everything - or so he thought! This personalized photo tie will be a hit around the water cooler or holiday party. Made of silky 100% polyester fabric and comes in six colors. Photos appear on both sides and measure 1x1½" each.
